column1: #Text=Katara says : " Aang , I still owe you an apology .
#Text=" Katara says : " Besides , who needs that stupid scroll anyway ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " Is that really how you feel ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " First , what did you learn ?

#Text=" Main Aang Katara Sokka Antagonists Fire Nation soldiers Iroh Pirate barker Oh Pirate captain Various pirates Zuko says : " Minor Appa Momo " Katara says : " Aang ... " Katara says : " Do you want to talk about it ?
#Text=" Aang says : " Nah , just a nightmare .
#Text=I was in the Avatar State , but I was outside my body watching myself .
